name: Cottontail and the Beast
description:
Controls :

Action Gamepad Keyboard Movement D-pad Arrows Jump A A
Teleport (once unlocked)
B Z
AttackX Q
Pause  (Here, you can rebind your controls.)
START
Esc

Story :

     In a world overrun by corruption, Cottontail, a brave rabbit armed with magical carrots, embarks on a journey through a complex world. He travels through winding underground tunnels in search of an ancient, a malevolent creature that threatens the universe. Alone against this formidable enemy, Cottontail must draw on his inner strength to save the world.
